name: Blasting Fruits Match 3
description:
you ever played some match 3 games like famous Candies Crushing or Jewels Stars games ? If you like them you will like this game as well !
This Blasting Fruits match 3 game is using cool fruits icons.
How to play :

- Match at least 3 or more fruits
- Match fruits until you get the best score

Features :

Very beautiful and high quality background and icons
Match 4 or 5 fruits in 1 line to get extra bonus.
The jewel bomb can eliminate the jewels around.
The timing Jewel can extend the game time.
The Horizontal and vertical line marked fruits can eliminate fruits in one row.
Eliminate the fruits and get 10 points for each jewel
